scripts.test:hotel: npx playwright test tests/hotel_e2e.spec.ts -g "Verify hotel funnel check" --workers=1
scripts.test:hotel:allure: npx playwright test tests/hotel_e2e.spec.ts -g "Verify hotel funnel check" --workers=1 --reporter=allure-playwright
scripts.test:hotel:headless: cross-env HEADLESS=true npx playwright test tests/hotel_e2e.spec.ts -g "Verify hotel funnel check" --workers=1 --reporter=allure-playwright
scripts.test:hotel:headed: cross-env HEADLESS=false npx playwright test tests/hotel_e2e.spec.ts -g "Verify hotel funnel check" --workers=1 --reporter=allure-playwright
scripts.test:with-report: npx playwright test && npm run allure:full
